I am a big Half Life Universe fan, so it is hard to choose a favorite, but this is likely my favorite Half Life game.  The pacing is great, the gameplay is varied, and I wanted to keep playing after I finished.  I put off playing the episodes for a long time, but this one in particular is well worth your time.

Would buy this expansion Twice

Esta continuaciÃ³n de Half Life 2 es superior al episodio 1 e incluso al propio Half Life 2. Una historia mÃ¡s elaborada, mejor contada y con mucha mÃ¡s carga emocional. Un ritmo de juego que va en aumento y una jugabilidad que saca todo lo bueno de Half Life y lo potencia. Es mÃ¡s largo que el episodio 1, todas sus fases estÃ¡n a un gran nivel, sin altibajos importantes y con mucha variaciÃ³n de escenarios, ademÃ¡s de presentar secretos por primera vez. Podremos conocer en mucha mÃ¡s profundidad el universo de Half Life, en especial a la especie Vortigaunt y las hormigas LeÃ³n.

En este episodio 2 disfrutamos de grandes momentos de exploraciÃ³n de entornos muy abiertos, de nuevas propuestas jugables como la detecciÃ³n de lugares llenos de suministros a travÃ©s de un radar y la observaciÃ³n del entorno. Este episodio estÃ¡ mÃ¡s enfocado a la exploraciÃ³n y resoluciÃ³n de puzzles, lo cual se agradece bastante. AdemÃ¡s todos los escenarios que visitamos son nuevos y no se reutilizan tantos enemigos y escenarios como sÃ­ ocurrÃ­a en el episodio 1. Esta vez los combates estÃ¡n mejor resueltos. Son mÃ¡s estratÃ©gicos con la inclusiÃ³n de nuevos enemigos muy originales a la vez que letales. No tendremos que lidiar con tiroteos monÃ³tonos como ocurrÃ­a al final de Half Life 2, sino que ahora los combates estÃ¡n mejor medidos, en escenarios que admiten mÃ¡s posibilidades e incluso con una nueva arma.
AdemÃ¡s, tenemos la posibilidad del uso de un nuevo vehÃ­culo, que en la fase final nos ayudarÃ¡ para detener a los robots zancudos y cazadores en la gran zona de White Forest. 

En resumen, un episodio muy recomendable donde han madurado la jugabilidad, sacando partido de todos los puntos fuertes de este juego y, sobre todo, dando mÃ¡s importancia a la historia y los personajes, que esta vez poseen una caracterizaciÃ³n mÃ¡s profunda. Un final de la saga totalmente abierto (esperando su continuaciÃ³n desde hace ya 9 aÃ±os) con esta intensa expansiÃ³n de Half Life 2.  8'4

By far, one of the most interesting and best games I've ever played! A friend of mine recommended me to play the Half-life series and it just blew me away. I love the gameplay. The characters stick what they do and I love the soundtracks. It fits well while fighting the combines and escaping them. Definitely recommend all the Half-life games to everyone. Half-life, Half-life 2, Half-life 2 ep. 1 & 2. I already miss playing the Half-life games and I think I'mma play them again soon just for the enjoyment. I give this game a 10/10 :D

It makes you want Half-Life 2: Episode Three or Half-Life 3 to be real.

Half Life 1 & 2 are easily classic and amazing games and so are Episodes 1 & 2, but I would like to say that episode Two was probably my favorite of the series.

I am very happy that valve chose to step away from the urban theme the half life games have and give it a very rural scenario.

It certainly worked well and the strider battle was the most intense and fun moment of the series.
Good. still waiting for that episode 3 though

Episode 2 is arguably the best HL game despite its short length. It is a bit more open than previous games in the series, meaning that you have more freedom to move around even though the game is still linear. This game, in my opinion is where Valve was at their best in terms of quality game design, and it really shows. Not to spoil anything, but the game also doubles as the world's best waiting simulator after the ending. You don't even have to have the game running to experience the waiting simulator part!

10/10 would wait for HL3 again

Half-LifeÂ® 2: Episode Two is the second in a trilogy of new games created by Valve that extends the award-winning and best-selling Half-LifeÂ® adventure. "second in a trilogy" "TRILOGY"
Among the best 3 hours of single player gaming I have ever experienced.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two Continues the Story of Gordon Freeman Yet Again.

GOOD:
Story Writing
Gravity Gun (Once Again, The ONLY Good Weapon in HL2)
Textures
Ragdolls
Voice Acting (It can be Funny Sometimes.)
New Enemies and New Areas to Check Out!

BAD:
The Worst Weapons in the Entire HL Franchise that are the HL2 Ones, AGAIN, Still Remain.
The Enemy Roster is YET STILL Hugely Repetitive.
Once Again The Music is Boring (The Main Reason why I replaced Nearly Every Track with Adrenaline Horror)
Valve Left Gordon Freeman's Story in the Dust After this Game.

This is Way better than Episode One, But the Crappy Weapons are STILL a Huge Flaw.
HEY, GABE!  GET OFF YOUR BUTT AND GET THE TEAM WORKING ON HL3, DAMN YOU!

Punto y "final" de la legendaria saga de Half-Life. Muy bueno, al igual que cada uno de ellos (aunque el primero siempre serÃ¡ el mejor). Continuamos justo donde lo dejamos en Episode One, tras escapar de la explosiÃ³n de Ciudad 17; ahora tendremos que abrirnos paso por sus alrededores hasta llegar a White Forest, donde nos reuniremos con Eli Vance y compaÃ±Ã­a para lanzar un cohete que cierre el gran portal que se ha abierto sobre Ciudad 17.

Este juego es el pionero de que aÃºn se espere el mÃ­tico Half-Life 3. La saga perfectamente podrÃ­a acabarse en el Episode Two, salvo un trÃ¡gico final que queda de cliffhanger hacia la continuaciÃ³n de la serie: tendremos que viajar hacia el Ãrtico para destruir una nave denominada "Borealis", que tranposrtaba cargamento cientÃ­fico de Aperture (empresa de la saga Portal). El objetivo no estÃ¡ tan claro, pero si alguna vez sale el Half-Life 3 (esperemos que sÃ­ porque el final es del todo inconcluso) el argumento se narrarÃ¡ en el Ãrtico .

Episode Two knÃ¼pft direkt an das Ende von Episode One an. Die Zitadelle von City 17 ist explodiert, wodurch der Zug, der Alyx und Gordon aus der Stadt bringen sollte, entgleist. Die beiden mÃ¼ssen sich nun den Weg durch das Umland von City 17 bahnen, um eine aus der Zitadelle gestohlene Nachricht mit wichtigen Informationen zum Widerstand zu bringen.

Dr Freeman â€¦ I realize this moment may not be the most â€¦ convenient for a heart to heart but I had to wait until your friends were otherwise occupied. There was a time they cared nothing for Miss Vance, when their only experience of humanity was a crowbar coming at them down a steel corridor. When I â€¦ plucked her from Black Mesa hehe, I acted in the face of objections that she was a mere child and of no practical use to anyone, I have learned to ignore such naysayers when quelling them hm ? was out of the question. Still, I am not one to squander my investments, and I remain confident she was worth far more than the initial, appraisal. That's why I must now... extract from you some small repayment owed for your own survival. See her safely to White Forest, Dr. Freeman. I wish I could do more than keep an eye on you, but I have agreed to abide by certain â€¦ restrictions. Well now, listen carefully, my dear. When you see your â€¦ father, relay these words: "prepare for unforeseen consequences".

Essa beleza de jogo me deu orgasmos, a historia vai ficando cada vez mais tensa e dramatica, o ultimo jogo (atÃ© hoje rs) da franquia. Olha, esse jogo Ã© muito bom, e tem plot twist fdp no final :V

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 is in my opinion the best Half-Life game of all time. It has a great story, several new and challenging enemies, several new and interesting characters, and a great sequel in Episode 1. The A.I. is slightly improved, the H.E.V. suit has had a slight modification, as well as the Gravity Gun. Graphics has also been improved, but nothing noticable. The game also seems much more tense than other Half-Life games because of the story. A new weapon for killing Striders is also introduced, and the ending will make you understand why everyone wants Half-Life 3. I would reccomend this game to anyone wanting to finish the Half-Life story. 10/10

The fact we're still eagerly awaiting a sequel after a nearly 10 year long cliffhanger speaks for itself.

It's almost poetic, really. Half-Life 2: Episode 2 details the struggle of Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance as they struggle through hardships on their way to White Forest. The game, after a few surprises here and there, ends on a high note - the Combine have, for now, been defeated. Everyone is celebrating, but also awaiting anxiously for what comes next.

But there is hope.

Then, as the game ends, that hope has been shattered, sucked dry in a few, agonizing moments. With Eli gone, the Resistance has lost some of its will to fight. Even though the Combine have been crippled, they do not die, and the Resistance must struggle yet more against the shadow of their malefactors.

Time will tell whether or not they succeeded. Perhaps the Resistance, after waiting for over a decade, will finally get their wish - to be free, at last. They can finally rest a little bit easier at night, knowing that they now have what they wanted.
Until such a day, however, this is the end of the line. This is the final stop until they finish building that railroad ahead.

In the meantime... This is where I get off.
The game was awesome! But this cliffhanger is AWFUL. DO NOT BUY, DON'T PLAY HALF LIFE, DON'T GET STUCK WAITING 23498572398572384728397 YEARS FOR HL3!!!!

[h1][i]Non puÃ² finire cosÃ¬...[/i][/h1]

Continua la storia di Half-Life 2: Episode 1. (Allerta spoiler) [spoiler]Dopo essere sopravvissuti e fuggiti dall'esplosione di City 17, Gordon e Alyx hanno l'opportunitÃ  di chiudere definitivamente il portale tra la Terra ed il mondo dei Combine. L'unica cosa da fare Ã¨ portare il pacchetto dati, che Alyx ha trafugato dai computer Combine di City 17, al sicuro alla base della Resistenza. Da lÃ¬, potranno usare i dati per impostare un missile in modo che chiuda il portale, una volta lanciato contro di esso (con gnomo da giardino annesso, se vi va). Il percorso verso casa Ã¨ perÃ² periglioso, ed anche quando tutto sarÃ  finito ed il portale sarÃ  chiuso, ci saranno dei conti in sospeso da sistemare...[/spoiler]

La [b][u]durata[/u][/b] di questo episodio Ã¨ circa il 40-45% di Half Life 2. GiÃ¹ di lÃ¬. Almeno cosÃ¬ m'Ã¨ sembrato.

Per quanto riguarda la [b][u]parte tecnica[/u][/b], rimando alla mia [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/guykarat/recommended/220]recensione di Half Life 2[/url].

Ed ora, [b][u]il finale[/u][/b]. Non dirÃ² come finisce questo gioco, ma dirÃ² che, se non vi sentite pronti a provare il piÃ¹ grosso [i]cliffhanger[/i] della vostra vita, Ã¨ meglio che non lo giochiate. La Valve non poteva trovare modo migliore (e, sotto alcuni aspetti, peggiore) per tenerci col fiato sospeso per anni dopo la fine del suo gioco. Ãˆ palese come la luce del sole che ci sarÃ  un seguito, [b][u]deve[/u][/b] esserci... il problema Ã¨ che non si sa quando ci sarÃ . Sono passati quasi 9 anni dal rilascio di questo gioco, ed ancora non si sa basilarmente nulla di Half-Life 3.
Ora capisco come ci si sente, cara community. I know the feel. Forse dovremo attendere l'arrivo del Source Engine 2 (pienamente confermato) per vedere questo nuovo titolo. Prego soltanto che la Valve lo faccia all'altezza dei precedenti.

Forza ragazzi, tutti in coro!
[h1][b]Gaben, we want Half-Life 3! And for God sake, make sure that, after 9 years in development, it'll be worth the wait!!! XD

Ğ“ĞµĞ¹Ğ±, ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¢Ğ Ğ•Ğ¢Ğ¬Ğ¯ Ğ§ĞĞ¡Ğ¢Ğ¬? (3 / THIRD EPISODE)

There we're supposed to be three episodes.
But we only received two of them in the end.
And therefore: There wasn't a proper ending.
However: They are both simply really good.
These games deserve the positive reviews.
Especially thanks to the great storytelling.
And the gameplay is of course awesome.
I loved the very first half-life game as well.
This entire franchise is simply fascinating.
And these two episodes are simply great.
The storytelling went on a whole new level.
And the atmosphere and visuals are great.
You can even get the soundtracks for free.
That just really deserves a positive review.

I'm probably the only person out there that doesn't want Half-Life 3 yet. I'm still waiting on the release of Half-Life 2: Episode Three.

We are at the mid-point in our trilogy of episodes which will conclude in [b] Episode 3 [/b]. - Gabe Newell 2007
